DOC.brief_title: Following Patients After Selective Pascal Laser Trabeculoplasty Treatment Chronic Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: Selective laser trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) pattern laser trabeculoplasty ( PLT , novel computer-guided laser use treat open-angle glaucoma ) two laser surgery method make trabeculoplasty patient open angle glaucoma . An observational prospective study perform , consecutive convenience sample patient indication SLT PLT recruit June 2014 uly 2016 follow-up 6 month , Fundación Oftalmológica Nacional ( Bogotá-Colombia ) . A non-probabilistic convenience sampling perform , consider average number patient diagnose chronic open-angle glaucoma undergo Laser trabeculoplasty Oftalmológica Nacional Fundacion correspond approximate 2 per month . Therefore expect enroll one patient per month laser use ( SLT PLT ) trabeculoplasty . Finally obtain sample size 18 patient per type laser total 36 patient recruitment period , September 2014 July 2016 . This study strictly observational , 's laser procedure cover national health insurance patient , well complication due procedure . An evaluation pre trabeculoplasty consecutive 5 visit perform follow : Visit 0 - Pre-procedure visit : subject undergo laser trabeculoplasty either Selective laser PASCAL laser invite participate inform consent carry . The information concert demographic characteristic ( study eye , age , gender ethnicity ) , clinical characteristic ( date glaucoma diagnosis , number medication use treat glaucoma , time use actually anti-glaucomatous topical medication ) slit lamp ophthalmoscopy examination ( corneal aspect , iris color , pupil gonioscopy , intraocular pressure , lens status , vitreous cell , vertical C/D ratio , optic nerve edge , rim characteristic [ ISNT pattern ] , peripapilar atrophy , state fovea , state peripheral retina state choroid eye ) extract record respective case report form ( CRF ) . Identical data extract , ophthalmological examination data , slit lamp exam , computerize visual field ( CVF ) ( CVF 3 6 month ) . One member investigation team collect information follow-up time , second one member review collate data . Statistical analysis perform SPSS version 21 . Univariate analyzes perform ; categorical variable , frequency distribution make report percentage , quantitative variable measure central tendency dispersion make ( mean , standard deviation range ) calculate accord relevance variable analyze . Demographics age gender variable describe . For bivariate analysis compare polytomous qualitative quantitative variable ( evolution intraocular pressure type trabeculoplasty use , number antihypertensive medication require procedure type trabeculoplasty , quantification cellularity anterior chamber type trabeculoplasty ) use parametric statistical analysis ANOVA independent sample nonparametric Kruskal-Wallis test . Also comparison quantitative variable quantitative variable ( intraocular pressure treatment evolution intraocular pressure treatment ) perform use parametric inferential statistical Pearson correlation analysis nonparametric Spearman correlation make . Finally , compare qualitative variable qualitative variable ( presence peak intraocular pressure type laser trabeculoplasty perform ) use non-parametric statistical analysis Chi square test , Fisher exact test Mac Nemar make .
DOC.criteria: Subjects either sex , age ≥ 40 year Best distant visual acuity , good equal 20/200 Diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma , pseudoexfoliation glaucoma pigmentary glaucoma , open angle Posner lens gonioscopy Intraocular pressure ≥ 20 mmHg , medical treatment , monotherapy combination therapy . Previous computerized visual field within six month previous perform trabeculoplasty Patients understand sign inform consent Patient diagnose openangle glaucoma undergo selective laser trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) amplitud 360 degree , laser trabeculaplastia pattern ( PASCALPattern Scan Laser ) amplitud 360 degree .
